body: Hello forum, Here is what I found, typically Total Radiation component shows 3 types of diagram: total, diffuse and direct radiation diagrams (which are not the same size and this is a minor problem). I want to use them all in my presentation but I also want to tweak their size and some text, so I go and bake it for AI. For some reason component bakes only 2 diagram and returns error: 1. Solution exception:index out of range: 0 [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/hcIObjdQVkxEUD2fmnfEha8XF9laEHHA-e6K6SI-zRMXWu3JJ3-WJEne7X80wgU*5sdQK-RJKwOhH2uAMDSxSznX*Z6g86hB/1.PNG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/hcIObjdQVkwJL9EOOwDUsAdvEqXzh10HH4ChKE*sAakTSHh0FU41sjRYD4Mz93YRsGLuCuouwEp5Pvxa7cQQhsNF3WeD7a-Z/2.PNG)As you can see direct radiation wan not baked, please check the component or let me know if I screwed something up. I updated LB the day before yesterday.
topic: Total Radiation component baking for AI fails to bake Direct Radiation
